quote: I guess he had listened to more beefs and more problems from more people than any of us. A guy that'll really listen to you, listen and care about what you're saying, is something rare.
quote_letters: I GUESS HE HAD LISTENED TO MORE BEEFS AND MORE PROBLEMS FROM MORE PEOPLE THAN ANY OF US A GUY THATLL REALLY LISTEN TO YOU LISTEN AND CARE ABOUT WHAT YOURE SAYING IS SOMETHING RARE
